transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Sir, awaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji bolo.
Executive: Hello. Main ji namaskar Shashank Tripathi baat kar raha tha senior manager IndiaMART head office se.
Customer: Sorry?
Executive: Sir Shashank Tripathi baat kar raha tha senior manager IndiaMART head office se.
Customer: Haan ji batao.
Executive: Ji actually sir kal aapke liye humne video meeting ek schedule karaya hua tha aapka serviceing part ko leke na registration ko leke to aap baat ho gayi thi aapke account manager se?
Customer: Unse issue koi sort out hua nahi, problem thi jo sort out hua nahi.
Executive: Sort out hua nahi? Kya issue tha jo sort out nahi hua sir?
Customer: Issue issue ye hai ki mere paas around jo main local hu Rajasthan se hu. Rajasthan Jaipur se hu. Rajasthan Jaipur se koi buylead aati nahi hai mere paas, main ke barabar aati hai. Jaipur Jaipur ke andar state level mein nahi hai. Haan. To wo city buylead aa rahi hai mere paas.
Executive: To aapke account manager ne not relevant option bataya hoga na aapko mark karne ke liye?
Customer: Bataya to mark kar diya to mark karta rahunga to lead to aayi na. Wahi sir not relevant option. Not relevant option diya isiliye gaya hai sir ki aapke paas lead kaun si nahi bhejni hai ye cheez hume pata kaise lagegi. Isiliye aapko option diya ki aap waha pe jab tak feedback mark nahi karoge sir dekho koi cheez na manually to hoti nahi hai ki hum one by one aapko lead send karte ho. Wo automatically portal pe generate hoti hai. Aapka keyword match hote hi wo lead aapke paas aa jati hai. Agar aap us lead ko not relevant mark kar rahe ho to hamari team ko pata lagega na ki next time se is tarike ki lead aapko nahi bhejni hai.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Isliye meeting humne isiliye karai thi so that ki bahut sare filters aap use hi nahi kar rahe the jiski wajah se hame exit feedback nahi mil pata hai hum pattern create nahi kar pate hain. To aapko sabse pehle to proper jo hai na tarike se aap portal use kariye aadhi cheeze to aapki waise hi resolve ho jayengi. Kyunki product humne update kar rakhe hain categories humne map kar rakhi hai aapko mujhe aapke catalog mein kahin par koi gaping nahi dikh rahi hai. Theek hai? Agar lagti hai to main pehle waha pe baat karta but jo cheeze hame gaping lag rahi hai wo aapko kal guide kar di gayi hai. Rest aap apne account manager ka number save rakhiye kuch bhi IndiaMART se related issue hota hai aap unko call kijiye wo aapko guide karenge.
Customer: Wo cheez to sahi hai. Dusri cheez main ye keh raha hu Rajasthan se kal mere paas Rajasthan Jaipur se koi buylead nahi hai.
Executive: Jaipur mein koi buylead nahi hai?
Customer: Jaipur Rajasthan ka koi nahi hai. Aati hai wo ke barabar aati hai aati nahi hai Jaipur ke bahar hai.
Executive: Ek second rukiye main check kar leta hu.
Executive: Ji online sir.
Executive: Sir Jaipur se buylead to available hai wedding stage backdrop ka ye abhi jo hai na 30 set ka buylead available hai.
Customer: Fiber ka hai wo fiber ka hum ke andar nahi hai.
Executive: Kya cheez?
Customer: Fiber ka hai wo set.
Executive: Fiber ka hai? Fiber ka hai. Ji.
Customer: Fiber ka hai. Fiber ka hai. Fiber ka hai. Ji.
Customer: To sir pehle nahi dikha hua nahi hai.
Customer: To maine us baat se dekhiye maine usme likha hua hoga fiber mein fiber jaise stage likha tha maine dekha tha usko.
Executive: Accha ji. To isme na main ek kaam kar deta hu sir. Ji. Ek na website main aapko bata raha hu aap note down karna chahe to kahin kar lijiye.
Customer: Mere ko Rajasthan Jaipur ki main ek kaam kar deta hu ye aapka whatsapp number hai na?
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Main aapko whatsapp pe ek website ka link share kar deta hu. Theek hai? IndiaMART ka hi website hai wo trade.indiamart.com aap us pe koi bhi buylead kisi bhi product ka aapko chahiye hai jo portal pe nahi dikh raha hai. To aap directly us portal pe jaake wo buylead manually search kijiye us us particular product se related jitna bhi buylead post hua hoga wo sari aapko screen pe dikhegi waha se consume kar sakte ho aap. Balance aapka yahi portal se kat jayega aap waha se jaake bhi buylead dekh sakte ho. Theek hai na? To main aapko jo hai na abhi website ka link de deta hu whatsapp ke upar aap directly waha se manually product ka naam dalna search karna.
Customer: Wo to filter lagata hu na main. Abhi jo wo mere paas portal aaya IndiaMART ka usme to filter lagate hain na wo cheez ko us cheez ke liye to.
Executive: Nahi aap lagate ho dekho hota kya hai na portal pe aapko mostly buylead wo dikhti hai jo hum aapke uses ke upar jo hai na pattern create karta hai. Aur waha par buylead sari dikhengi aapko. Haan na to usme aap shortlist kar lena jo aapke liye relevant lage wo aap consume kar lena.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Bas please koi bhi buylead aap aisi consume mat karna jo aapke kaam ki na ho aur buylead not relevant mark karna start kijiye so that ki hum relevancy part pe aapko help kar paye.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai sir? Baki main whatsapp kar deta hu aapko link aap ek bar check kar lo.
Customer: Theek hai sir karenge. Rest mere feedback ke liye aapko jo hai na mail aayega to waha par jo hai na aap please yes zaroor mark kar de.
Customer: Sorry sir?
Executive: Feedback mail aapke paas aayega usme satisfied zaroor mark kar dijiyega aapki baat ho gayi.
Customer: Ji ji ji ji ji. Thank you so much sir.
Executive: Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving relevant buyleads from Jaipur, Rajasthan.

- Fiber buyleads are not in their category.



Resolution:

- Explained the importance of marking irrelevant buyleads.

- Provided a link to IndiaMART's website to search manually.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share the website link on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, filters, relevancy, website
